movies.title: Title: Megaman
movies.sum: Overview: A brave robot volunteers to combat the mechanoid minions of a mad scientist bent on world domination.

movies.title: My Hero Academia: All Might Rising
movies.sum: 3rd My Hero Academia OVA. A short special about All Might included with the Blu-ray/DVD release of My Hero Academia: Two Heroes.

movies.title: Barbie
movies.sum: Barbie and Ken are having the time of their lives in the colorful and seemingly perfect world of Barbie Land. However, when they get a chance to go to the real world, they soon discover the joys and perils of living among humans.
